entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In this Frame, errors can occur if the Image's WidthRequest attribute value is less than 160. Cause that 'hot reload' is very fragile. #19543
    Backlog
  • MAUI WinUI Grids don't render properly in flyout menu #19542
    Backlog
  • [iOS] - Swipeview with collectionview issue #19541
    Backlog
  • Nuget connectivity/ Android Device manager connectivity #19537
  • Getting AccessViolationException while adding custom resource dictionary in App.Xaml file #19535

Closed

  • Problem in MAUI GraphicsView, DRagInteraction Stops when Pointer is not moved. #19270
  • Need to add Grid tag to work properly in Android #19319
  • [Android] ScrollOrientation.Neither not disable scroll #19213
  • ScrollView within ScrollView, outer partly stops working after scrolling inner #19323
  • RadioButton TextColor not applying on MacOS and iOS in MAUI #19520
  • Add implicit operators between System.Drawing.Color and Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color #19538
  • Restore is failing. Error - AndroidManifest.xml file doesn't exist in default MAUI project #19416
  • Request to add TabIndex, IsTabStop and Focusable #19539
  • MAUI RadioButton CheckedState color #19272
  • [regression/8.0.0] Border is not displayed when inside a Frame in .net 8 #19274
  • TranslationX/Y Changes Won't Be Applied to Bounds In AbsoluteLayout #19368
  • MAUI project, which adds a quill project as a control call. Packaging has been unsuccessful. I checked the Internet N times, and they all said that the .cspproject file should be removed #19399
  • In flexlayout, appear abnormal if AlignContent = "SpaceBetween" and Wrap = "Reverse". #19400
  • Child controls doesn't ignore safeArea even if you've disabled the safe area for the page in .Net 8 #19296
  • .NET Maui is showing 80 errors #19404

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable flaky compat test #19546
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Merged

  • Set Simulator UDID explicitly for CG UI tests #19540
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [testing] Enable a way to test on real devices #19492
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19533
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, stale, Under Consideration
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨, stale
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, partner/android
